# Issue Template

## Description
Brief description of the issue

## Type
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Feature Request
- [ ] Enhancement
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Testing

## Priority
- [ ] High
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] Low

## Details
Detailed description of the issue, including:
- Current behavior
- Expected behavior
- Steps to reproduce (if applicable)
- Proposed solution (if any)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

## Additional Context
Any additional information, screenshots, or context that would be helpful.
